#ifndef BEAST_CREATE_UVSET_H
#define BEAST_CREATE_UVSET_H

#include <maya/MPxCommand.h>

namespace beastmaya {

class BeastCreateUVSetCmd : public MPxCommand
{
public:
        BeastCreateUVSetCmd(){}
        virtual ~BeastCreateUVSetCmd(){}

        static MSyntax newSyntax();
        virtual MStatus doIt ( const MArgList& args );
        static void* creator();
};

}

#endif // BEAST_CREATE_UVSET_H
